page.title: 18A Sunday- by 5year olds.
page.content: {I am Mark.} I got up at 10.00 a.m. on Sunday. I had toast and jam for breakfast then I went outside to play football. I had lunch at 2.00 p.m. I ate salad. After that I played inside. Teatime was at 6.00 p.m. I went to bed at 9.00 p.m. { I am Vicky.}I got up on Sunday at 9.00 a.m. I had "Weetabix" for breakfast then I went to church. I had lunch at 2.00 p.m. I ate potatoes carrots and peas. After that I played with my dolls. Teatime was at 5.00 p.m. and I went to bed at 6.00 p.m. {I am Aidan.}I got up at 7.00 a.m. on Sunday and I had "Shreddies" for my breakfast and then I played. I had lunch at 2.00 p.m. I ate salad and crisps and after that I played cars. Teatime was at 6.00 p.m. and I went to bed at 8.00 p.m.
